DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the incidence and natural course of inflammatory bowel disease in the southeastern area of Korea.
DOC.brief_title: Inflammatory Bowel Disease Registry in Daegu-Gyeongbuk
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of inflammatory bowel disease including Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis Followed up for at least 6 months for the correct diagnosis Patients who do not live in DaeguGyeongbuk province
DOC.keyword: inflammatory bowel disease, registry, incidence, Korea
